note: Any changes to the below will require emptying all of your browser's cache (ctrl F5?)

comicPages.title: The Quest For Jonuts
comicPages.comment: A comic created to share with my friends in one of my work groups at Raytheon. Whenever I had some time to spare I would work on the next page to this. The original concept for this was to have a sc-fi adventure about some people looking for some "artifact."

comicPages.title: Hear Hear
comicPages.comment: Behold the start of a sci-fi adventure/quest to find The Legendary Jonuts!

comicPages.title: Goots
comicPages.comment: He is called 'Goots' because of the huge G on his boots. His real name is Fredward.

comicPages.title: Vaimes
comicPages.comment: He actually likes the taste of Leen. He can also be quite persuasive at times.

comicPages.title: Grideo
comicPages.comment: He owns a Leen Ventilator snorkel.

comicPages.title: Globol
comicPages.comment: Grideo's familiar. He says *Glub* alot.

comicPages.title: Stat Value Scale
comicPages.comment: To give a bit of perspective on the "laws of the world."

comicPages.title: START
comicPages.comment: All together we have their "zoomed out" designs.

comicPages.title: Home 1
comicPages.comment: The outpost base where the team resides. Each member contributed a bit to the base's design.

comicPages.title: Home 2
comicPages.comment: Every adventure starts somewhere. This one starts in the breakroom.

comicPages.title: Home 3
comicPages.comment: The ship bay where all the big stuff is stored.

comicPages.title: Home 4
comicPages.comment: The cockpit where Vaimes isn't allowed to operate anything save for starting the ship.

comicPages.title: Home 5
comicPages.comment: *spit*

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 1
comicPages.comment: Everyone knows there are no ICEEs in the ICEE Emporium. It is just bears.

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 2
comicPages.comment: The logs of the previous team last say they were at the cabin down there in the bear infested woods.

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 3
comicPages.comment: A classic.

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 4
comicPages.comment: This fight originally used to be just this one scene with poor drawings. This first fight has been 'remastered.'

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 5
comicPages.comment: I took some inspiration from Goots'es namesake.

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 6
comicPages.comment: The things one can do with a bit of Leen.

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 7
comicPages.comment: Combo Attack!

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 8
comicPages.comment: KERBLOOOOSH!

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 9
comicPages.comment: In the original run the team ended up at the cabin immediately after the blast.

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 10
comicPages.comment: Leen can even heal people???

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 11
comicPages.comment: Grideo is Leen-tose Intolerant.

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 12
comicPages.comment: All healed up and ready to go...

comicPages.title: ICEE Emporium 13
comicPages.comment: ...out of the frying pan...

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 1
comicPages.comment: ...and into the fire!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 2
comicPages.comment: So people DO find Jonuts!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 3
comicPages.comment: Does that count as an ICEE?

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 4
comicPages.comment: The team's "zoomed out very very far" looks.

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 5
comicPages.comment: The ICEE Bear grew too big!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 6
comicPages.comment: No air lock means everything is getting sucked out! Thankfully the bear plug will slow down the Emporium's destruction!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 7
comicPages.comment: Never leave your Lean Ventilator on the ship and always keep it on your person!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 8
comicPages.comment: Escape!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 9
comicPages.comment: Success! And the Emporium is no more!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 10
comicPages.comment: The ICEE Bear however is still very much there!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 11
comicPages.comment: He is growing beyond planet sized!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 12
comicPages.comment: When gravitational pull beats Orange-Ade thrusters!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 13
comicPages.comment: New plan!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 14
comicPages.comment: Destroy the sweater!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 15
comicPages.comment: No sweater reserves means no more growing in space without oxygen!

comicPages.title: ICEE Bear 16
comicPages.comment: Victory!

comicPages.title: The Leening Tower of Leen 1
comicPages.comment: Onwards to Planet Leen!

comicPages.title: The Leening Tower of Leen 2
comicPages.comment: The things the Leen-tose Intolerant must go through to visit planet Leen.

comicPages.title: The Leening Tower of Leen 3
comicPages.comment: No one really knows why it is Leening like that ;)

comicPages.title: The Leening Tower of Leen 4
comicPages.comment: Tourism here at Planet Leen is one of the biggest industries! Second only to the Leen making itself!

comicPages.title: The Leening Tower of Leen 5
comicPages.comment: Make sure to stay close to one another in these sardine-packed lines!

comicPages.title: The Leening Tower of Leen 6
comicPages.comment: LeenKins are a real pest on Planet Leen. Insurance plans for Leen products are all the rage here!

comicPages.title: The Leening Tower of Leen 7
comicPages.comment: I did not keep a reference of the character art until after this page.

comicPages.title: The Leening Tower of Leen 8
comicPages.comment: Could this mystery person at the desk be yourself? The reader?

comicPages.title: The Leening Tower of Leen 9
comicPages.comment: What did Jonuts do to these people?

comicPages.title: The Leening Tower of Leen 10
comicPages.comment: We can cover more ground if we split up!

comicPages.title: Grideo in the Leen Factory 1
comicPages.comment: Nothing like a little tour to take a break from all of the adventuring!

comicPages.title: Grideo in the Leen Factory 2
comicPages.comment: Can't have a good product without getting it purified first!

comicPages.title: Grideo in the Leen Factory 3
comicPages.comment: Definitely safe for consumption! Our scientists said so!

comicPages.title: Grideo in the Leen Factory 4
comicPages.comment: How Lean Familiars are commercially made.

comicPages.title: Grideo in the Leen Factory 5
comicPages.comment: No shortcuts to becoming a Leen-o-mancer!

comicPages.title: Grideo in the Leen Factory 6
comicPages.comment: Grideo makes his own Leen Familiars.

comicPages.title: Grideo in the Leen Factory 7
comicPages.comment: On to the next side story!

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 1
comicPages.comment: Everyone knows you can't just drink Leen as is from the ground!

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 2
comicPages.comment: The tournament arc.

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 3
comicPages.comment: A dream come true?

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 4
comicPages.comment: Not all naughty wizards are sent to the Leen Cube.

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 5
comicPages.comment: We've just begun and Vaimes is already 5 drinks in! Wizby is already out!

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 6
comicPages.comment: Jornes can't take it anymore, and what's this? Leanzy is speeding up and taking the lead!

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 7
comicPages.comment: Vaimes is slowing down and Flaz held out for as long as he could!

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 8
comicPages.comment: Leanzy is going ham with the Leen, and what is going on with Smit?

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 9
comicPages.comment: Smit has awakened his true potential. Unfortunately Leen demigods are not allowed to participate so he is out!

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 10
comicPages.comment: A break between the final two! Who will win!

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 11
comicPages.comment: Bets are 20 to 1 in Leanzy's favor!

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 12
comicPages.comment: Leanzy is not even letting Vaimes have a chance!

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 13
comicPages.comment: Too much Leen in a Leen familiar will make it grow in size.

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 14
comicPages.comment: Leanzy is going to the Leen Cube for his lies about his "Leen Stats."

comicPages.title: Vaimes tasting some Leen 15
comicPages.comment: And on to whatever Goots is up to!

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 1
comicPages.comment: A real RPG expierience with skill trees and crafting!

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 2
comicPages.comment: Jo Mama

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 3
comicPages.comment: 5 quests for banned information?

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 4
comicPages.comment: You start with just your fists...

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 5
comicPages.comment: And then you use your tools to do more....

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 6
comicPages.comment: You use your skills...

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 7
comicPages.comment: You make a process and create some shortcuts...

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 8
comicPages.comment: You speed up the process...

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 9
comicPages.comment: Help those in need...

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 10
comicPages.comment: Prepare...

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 11
comicPages.comment: Show off a bit...

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 12
comicPages.comment: Look really cool...

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 13
comicPages.comment: Do an odd job...

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 14
comicPages.comment: all before going on to do the final objective!

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 15
comicPages.comment: Calm before the storm.

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 16
comicPages.comment: *GLUB*

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 17
comicPages.comment: Everyone has made it back to each other in one way or another!

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 18
comicPages.comment: FIGHT!

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 19
comicPages.comment: FREEDOM!

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 20
comicPages.comment: Quest Complete!

comicPages.title: Goots questing for information 21
comicPages.comment: Here is your reward!

comicPages.title: Where the Jonuts are 1
comicPages.comment: The location of the Jonuts...

comicPages.title: Where the Jonuts are 2
comicPages.comment: Has been revealed!

comicPages.title: Escape from Planet Leen 1
comicPages.comment: They got Leen Spears that shoot Leen Shots!

comicPages.title: Escape from Planet Leen 2
comicPages.comment: This ain't the teams first rodeo!

comicPages.title: Escape from Planet Leen 3
comicPages.comment: This was drawn after I read the first set of chapters from Berserk.

comicPages.title: Escape from Planet Leen 4
comicPages.comment: Back the way they came.

comicPages.title: Escape from Planet Leen 5
comicPages.comment: It really helps to keep a reference of what the ship looks like😅.

comicPages.title: Escape from Planet Leen 6
comicPages.comment: Those Leen Shots can blow up the ship if they don't do something now!

comicPages.title: Escape from Planet Leen 7
comicPages.comment: Vaimes has a plan!

comicPages.title: Escape from Planet Leen 8
comicPages.comment: The plan.

comicPages.title: Escape from Planet Leen 9
comicPages.comment: The End ;)

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 1
comicPages.comment: The ship;s main interstellar orange-ade engines were removed by Planet Leen security. The price for going around and asking about Jonuts.

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 2
comicPages.comment: Far off in the distance you can see one of the gates for ships to do interstellar travel without advanced engines.

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 3
comicPages.comment: ResTo ships are big so they can accomadate many people whom need a break from flying or need to fill up on fuel. Allegedly their bathrooms are the second cleanest in the universe!

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 4
comicPages.comment: Didn't they read the signs on the inside of the ship? Have none of them been there before?

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 5
comicPages.comment: The price for breaking the rules.

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 6
comicPages.comment: The strength of Goots!

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 7
comicPages.comment: The tolerance of Vaimes and Globol!

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 8
comicPages.comment: The magic of Grideo and his familiar!

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 9
comicPages.comment: Their combined efforts!

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 10
comicPages.comment: Serve 10 years as ResTo head of Poliz and you too could get your picture on the wall!

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 11
comicPages.comment: Hey Listen!

comicPages.title: Rest Stop 12
comicPages.comment: Convenient for him to leave such a thing out at the beginning.
